Setting.Name: Ticket::CustomModule###002-ComplementoCustomTicketTime
Setting.Description: Carrega o módulo para reescrever a função TicketAccountedTimeGet.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldStartID
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which marks the start of the task.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldEndID
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which marks the end of the task.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldAccredit
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which marks the Accredit hours of the task.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldSolutionTimeDestinationDate
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which will recieve the value from SolutionTimeDestinationDate Accredit hours of the task.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::GraphTitle
Setting.Description: Set title for the graph in Customer Interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::QtdeMonth
Setting.Description: Set Month to show in the interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::CustomerCountHours
Setting.Description: Field used to defined Company hired hours. Ex: CustomerCompanyComment

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldWorkHoursStart
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which marks the start of the work hours.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Complemento::AccountedTime::DynamicFieldWorkHoursEnd
Setting.Description: Numeric ID of Article Dynamic Field which marks the end of the work task.
